coulombpythonic_example
=======================

.. py:module:: coulombpythonic_example

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   CoulombPythonic Example Script

   This script demonstrates the usage of the coulombpythonic module for quantum wire
   Coulomb calculations. It shows both the modern Pythonic interface and the
   Fortran-compatible interface.

   Author: AI Assistant
   Date: 2024



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   coulombpythonic_example.exit_code


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   coulombpythonic_example.create_test_system
   coulombpythonic_example.demonstrate_pythonic_interface
   coulombpythonic_example.demonstrate_fortran_interface
   coulombpythonic_example.demonstrate_performance_scaling
   coulombpythonic_example.create_visualization
   coulombpythonic_example.main


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: create_test_system(N=32)

   Create a test quantum wire system.


.. py:function:: demonstrate_pythonic_interface()

   Demonstrate the modern Pythonic interface.


.. py:function:: demonstrate_fortran_interface()

   Demonstrate the Fortran-compatible interface.


.. py:function:: demonstrate_performance_scaling()

   Demonstrate performance scaling with system size.


.. py:function:: create_visualization(Veh, Vee, Vhh, Win, Wout, BGR)

   Create visualization of the results.


.. py:function:: main()

   Main example function.


.. py:data:: exit_code
   :value: 1
